attributes.review: upon entering the app i was bombarded by a picture of trump asking me for my phone number and that was not a good start and then i started getting calls from him asking to meet up and i was like woah woah woah im just here for Barron
attributes.title: the dumbest thing ever 👎

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded took about 4 hours to just download. When I got on the app it was v confusing nothing made sense. And like what is the app even for? No one knows!! I don’t think anyone even likes trump tbh. Unless your a Karen or a Susan. Even my cat gags when I show her pictures of him. “Let’s make America great again” yeah when has it Ever been great. I mean from slaves to many wars we probably have had like a couple good things happen. But I’m getting off track. So anyways awful app do not recommend. Like nosir 💀✨🔪😳🖐
attributes.title: Eww 😷

attributes.review: Please remove this application from the App Store. This application is not helpful and is extremely useless.
attributes.title: Absolute worst app

attributes.review: The app just sucked like as soon  as I got on the was this like old white dude talking about banning tik too and like kicking out everyone that wasn’t white. But any way the app sucked.

attributes.review:
Wealth🤑fame🤩power🤴🏻Gold Roger🙌the king👑of the pirates⛵️obtained🤜this and everything else💰the World🌏had to offer🤲And his dying😵words🗣drove🛵countless souls🧖to the seas🌊

🤴🏻“You want my treasure?💰You can have it!🙌I left everything I gathered💫together in one place🗺Now you👆just have to find it!”🧐🧭

These words👄lured men🧔🏻to the grand line⛰pursuing dreams🚣greater than✨they ever dared🤺to imagine🧘‍♂️This is the time🕰known🧏as the great🌟pirate⚔️era⛵️😁
attributes.title: The One Piece

attributes.title: No!!!

attributes.review: god i can’t even describe how BAD this app is 🤢 i’m pretty sure it stole my debit and credit card number, my wallet, my cash, my car, my plants, my shoes, my clothes, my last pair of socks, my food, my fridge, my underwear, my sister, my mom, my dad, my mac and cheese, my apples, my bed, my friends, my dog, my cat, my nightstand, my grill, my laptop, my coffee cup, my shampoo, my conditioner, my soap, my towels, my jewelery, my dignity, and my will to live
attributes.title: HORRIBLE! DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app asked for my ethnicity and when I but black/African American it stopped loading 😡 just trash!!! Please remove

attributes.review:
are you kidding me buddy??? you are messing with the wrong generation my guy. we have nothing to lose, and way too
much time to spare. tik tok is all we have left and i swear to god if you take it away. anyways this app much like its namesake IS TERRIBLE, RACIST, HOMOPHOBIC, ANTI SEMETIC, and OVERALL SHOULS NOT BE ONLINE PERIOD ESPECIALLY NOT THE APP STORE
